verses.verse: The LORD <S%H3068><s%> reigns; <S%H4427><s%> let the earth <S%H776><s%> rejoice; <S%H1523><s%> let the multitude <S%H7227><s%> of isles <S%H339><s%> be glad <S%H8056><s%> thereof.
Clouds <S%H6051><s%> and darkness <S%H6205><s%> are round <S%H5439><s%> about him: righteousness <S%H6664><s%> and judgment <S%H4941><s%> are the habitation <S%H4349><s%> of his throne. <S%H3678><s%>
A fire <S%H784><s%> goes <S%H3212><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, and burns <S%H3857><s%> up his enemies <S%H6862><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about.
His lightning <S%H1300><s%> enlightened <S%H215><s%> the world: <S%H8398><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> saw, <S%H7200><s%> and trembled. <S%H2342><s%>

The hills <S%H2022><s%> melted <S%H4549><s%> like wax <S%H1749><s%> at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the Lord <S%H113><s%> of the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth. <S%H776><s%>
The heavens <S%H8064><s%> declare <S%H5046><s%> his righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> his glory. <S%H3519><s%>

Confounded <S%H954><s%> be all <S%H3605><s%> they that serve <S%H5647><s%> graven <S%H6459><s%> images, that boast <S%H1984><s%> themselves of idols: <S%H457><s%> worship <S%H7812><s%> him, all <S%H3605><s%> you gods. <S%H430><s%>

Zion <S%H6726><s%> heard, <S%H8085><s%> and was glad; <S%H8056><s%> and the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> rejoiced <S%H1523><s%> because <S%H4616><s%> of your judgments, <S%H4941><s%> O LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

For you, LORD, <S%H3068><s%> are high <S%H5945><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%> you are exalted <S%H5927><s%> far <S%H3966><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> gods. <S%H430><s%>

You that love <S%H157><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> hate <S%H8130><s%> evil: <S%H7451><s%> he preserves <S%H8104><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> of his saints; <S%H2623><s%> he delivers <S%H5337><s%> them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
Light <S%H216><s%> is sown <S%H2232><s%> for the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> and gladness <S%H8057><s%> for the upright <S%H3477><s%> in heart. <S%H3820><s%>
Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> you righteous; <S%H6662><s%> and give thanks <S%H3034><s%> at the remembrance <S%H2143><s%> of his holiness. <S%H6944><s%>
